title: Irrespective of the area of a plot, if the width thereof is 7
clause_text: Irrespective of the area of a plot, if the width thereof is 7.0 m. or less, then the side margin shall be nil.
section: Side and Rear Marginal Distances in Congested Area

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Irrespective of the area of a plot, if the width thereof is 7.0 m. or less, then the side margin shall be nil.
